scriptZsh:
#!/bin/bash 
sudo apt install zsh curl git -y 
export RUNZSH=no 
sh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh/master/tools/install.sh)"
scriptAutojump:
sudo apt-get install python-is-python3
git clone git://github.com/wting/autojump.git ~/.tmp
cd ~/.tmp
./install.py
sed -i 's/ plugins=(git /& autojump/' ~/.zshrc
source ~/.zshrc
